unnormalised: Did you know that NH 44, stretching 3745 km, is India's longest national highway, connecting Srinagar to Kanyakumari? Also, remember to carry your DL and RC when travelling interstate!
normalised: Did you know that N-H forty four, stretching three thousand seven hundred and forty five kilometer, is India's longest national highway, connecting Srinagar to Kanyakumari? Also, remember to carry your D-L and R-C when travelling interstate!
